alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 5:02AM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...LIGHT SNOWFALL AND SOME SLICK ROADS FOR THE PANHANDLES... Light snow will continue to develop across much of the Panhandles through this morning. Snowfall will then dissipate over portions of the central Texas Panhandle during the mid to late morning. Snowfall, while light in accumulation, has led to reports of occasional slick roadways. Drivers should be cautious during their morning commute. Wind chill values will be in the single digits above and below zero through the mid morning on Thursday. Cold conditions along with snowfall may bring some impacts to the Thursday morning commute. High temperatures Thursday are expected to not get above freezing for the majority of the combined Panhandles. Stay tuned to the developments of this winter system by visiting our homepage at www.weather.gov/ama/
